1.00.name: wordpress/flexo-facebook-manager
1.00.description:
All in One Facebook Manager. It integrates Facebook in your Site. Flexo Facebook Manager have many Options, which will allow the User to Achieve optimal Social Network Integration. Currently, this Plugin supports:

  1. Like Box
  2. Comments Area
  3. Open Graph Protocol
  4. View customization
  5. Different Options for personalization
  6. Ability to store locally the count of Likes and Comments (for sorting etc.)
  7. Multiple Languages support

This Plugin is working with Pages, Posts, Categories and Widgets.

For Demo, you can visit the URL bellow: http://www.flexostudio.com/flexo-facebook-manager.html

PS: If you like this Plugin, dont forget to support us by giving a Rating

For more our Plugins see: http://www.flexostudio.com/wordpress-plug
